Reviews.Title: Good Phone No support
Reviews.Author: Bee boy "BEe BOY"
Reviews.Content: I bought this smart phone but I could not get good support on how it works. The instruction come in a 2 font manual it is literally 3 inches square. I do like the phone but for 200 bucks I would like to have easy ablity to buy new battery a screen protector and casing but they do not have support for this device online. I am trying to find a comparable phone and try to adapt to that.

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 2.2 smartphone
4.3 inch capacitive touchscreen
Dual cameras
WiFi - Unlocked
Dual SIM
ProductInfo.Name: Aurous - Dual SIM Android 2.2 Smartphone with 4.3 Inch HD Capacitive Touchscreen
